title: Career Advisor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at High Point University (High Point, NC)
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed with all of the team members at once and then the Provost individually. Went on a campus tour and had casual one-on-one time with team members as well. Standard interview questions.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself. Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Campus Ambassador Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at High Point University
Interview Descriptions: 3 rounds: 1st by nomination, second is more in depth & the third is a mock tour of campus. Be prepared to know campus info & answer any questions that come your way.
Interview Questions: Prepare for difficult hypothetical parent questions.

title: Senior Career Advisor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at High Point University
Interview Descriptions: Random questions didn't seem to have any purpose at all and were not related to the position. Panel interview with each person asking a question, but no follow up questions.
Interview Questions: What was your best job?

title: Career Advisor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at High Point University
Interview Descriptions: There was a first round phone interview where I talked to the hiring manager. Then there was an in-person interview with the entire team followed by an in-person interview with the provost.
Interview Questions: Tell me a little about yourself.

title: Laboratory Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at High Point University in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview was scheduled for 30-45 mins and you had to be dressed in business casual. I was asked about my work experience, if I can work weekends and holidays, told what the position and what responsibilities would be required, met with the supervisor of the projects, and I was showed the offices and the facility I would be working in if given the position. The interview ended up lasting almost two hours so it depends whether you can connect with the interviewer.
Interview Questions: - How long have you been working with animals? - Are you okay with working on holidays and weekends? - What would you like to learn if you were given the position? - Do have any research experience? If not, why do you want to be involved in research? - Tell me about yourself - Why do you want to leave your current position?

title: Graduate Recruiter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at High Point University
Interview Descriptions: Very relaxed and open ended questions. The interviewer made me feel comfortable and the interview lasted around 20 minutes. Be prepared to ask questions in the end to show interest.
Interview Questions: Why did you choose to attend  ———-?

title: Coordinator of Club Sports Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at High Point University in Sept 2021
Interview Descriptions: I thought the interview process was short yet thorough. The questions were relative to specific job and I had a great conversation with the interviewer which I hope leads to a job at HPU!
Interview Questions: What kind of experience do I have with budgeting?

title: Student Ambassador Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at High Point University
Interview Descriptions: Very in-depth and you must take the time to prepare as it is a very elite program. There are multiple steps in the process and they are very particular when choosing who will earn this elite role
Interview Questions: Behavioral questions were the main focus

title: Security Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at High Point University (High Point, NC) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Your first greeted then take it to do agility test if you pass you move to the next interviewing process if you fail you're sent home and told you can reapply in 6 months. I have passed that level as well as the next now waiting on the 3rd.
Interview Questions: What is the most response for security

title: Anonymous Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at High Point University (High Point, NC)
Interview Descriptions: I was emailed to set up an interview.  The actual face to face interview went really well.  Staff and management were very friendly.   Followed by a follow-up phone call.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Gallery Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at High Point University in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: Friendly, not too long. Insightful questions. Was very attentive in the conversation. Director knows what she wants and how she wants it done, she just wants to see if you are compatible.
Interview Questions: What made you interested in HPU?

title: University Ambassador Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at High Point University (High Point, NC) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: Multiple round interview process that included a required recommendation to apply.  After application is submitted, it is reviewed and applicant may be invited back for a first interview. If applicant makes it through the first interview they are then invited to walk through a mock tour.
Interview Questions: What is the surrounding High Point area like off campus?

title: Senior Account Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at High Point University (High Point, NC) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions:
Phone call to schedule interview followed by a detailed email with directions to the site -
 friendly and inviting - comfortable discussion.  Interview lasted about an hour and I was encouraged to email with follow up questions.
Interview Questions: My management style

title: Student Success Coach Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at High Point University
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview with the associate dean and two other student success coaches. It was very short and it was pulling teeth to get them to talk. Seemed very unresponsive and asked basic questions.
Interview Questions: What interest you in the position and in High Point University?

title: Data Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at High Point University (High Point, NC) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: Initial meeting at coffee shop. Then on another day, the 2nd interview was held in the office. In the office interviews, I interviewed with manager and then another interview with the team. I thought it went well, manager seemed very positive, but I was not offered the job. But a few months later they called me asking if I was still interested but by that time I had already accepted another job offer.
Interview Questions: Why I feel I was a good fit

title: Survey Researcher Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at High Point University (High Point, NC) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: The interview process can best be described as simple and comprehensive. After applying on the WorkDay platform, I was interviewed and onboarded within the same week. However, it is important to note that I was a student at the university during this time, possibly explaining the expedited process.
Interview Questions: How would you respond to an aggressive or offensive caller?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at High Point University
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview first. Hours later received an email that they would like move forward and have me come on campus. Came on campus, met one on one with people in the department, also went to lunch where the talk was casual but there was definitely a little bit of interviewing going on. I was there including with lunch for like 2.5hours.
Interview Questions: They asked how my prior experience would help me in the position I was applying for. They also asked about my organizational skills.

title: Resident Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at High Point University in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: Rather simple, they valled and asked basic questions. They told me I would hear back from them in a few weeks and I never did. I called them back to check and they said the same thing and I never heard from them.
Interview Questions: They asked about common issues and how to over come them.

title: Resident Director Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at High Point University
Interview Descriptions: I did a phone interview and in person interview
Interview Questions: Questions about experience culture, supervision, first responder skills

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at High Point University (High Point, NC) in Dec 2013
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted by e-mail to schedule an on campus interview. I did and found the campus easy to navigate and good parking near the interview building. I participated in a group interview first and then a one-on-one with the department manager.
Interview Questions: The questions were mostly based on the fact that I was overqualified for the position. I explained why I was looking for a lower level position, but the questioning continued.

title: Facility Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at High Point University in Oct 2013
Interview Descriptions: Go in they hire anyone, if they have and opening they will do anything in their power to fill it, Not many hours to go around, way too many people working there to actually get paid.
Interview Questions: What do you like to do

title: Dispatcher/Security Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at High Point University in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: The interview was a simple one. We went through quick testing & answering sections. The interview staff were friendly but firm.
Interview Questions: There were no real difficult questions to me they were pretty standard for the department.

title: Resident Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at High Point University (High Point, NC) in Aug 2011
Interview Descriptions: My interview was a simple, quick phone interview to see how well I fit with High Point and to see my interest. They asked me questions about why I was applying for this position, how well I could perform the job functions, and about past experiences within previous jobs. It was very simple and straightforward.
Interview Questions: Why are you applying to be a Resident Director? How does this fit within your long-term goals?

title: Student Life Interview
Application Type: The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at High Point University (High Point, NC) in May 2011
Interview Descriptions: Got asked what animal I would be. Interviewer did not even know anything about position I was applying for.
Interview Questions: What animal would you be?

title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at High Point University (High Point, NC) in May 2010
Interview Descriptions: Went very well.  Felt comfortable throughout the process.  Just be friendly and do not appear too aggressive.  Cover up your tattoos if you have any.  If you are a man, no earring.
Interview Questions: Why High Point?

title: Security Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at High Point University (High Point, NC) in May 2010
Interview Descriptions: very long and drawn out
Interview Questions: personal questions
